oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Major General, Staff & Line Officers (Undress, 1841-1850)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The artist H.A. Ogden created these color plates to document the uniforms of the American soldier from the Revolution to 1888. Ogden received $100 for each completed illustration and ultimately completed 47 works. Here he illustrates US officers with an enlisted dragoon in the background from the Mexican War era.
